Package it.bonfire.ProjectOOP.Controller

Class AppController

java.lang.Object
it.bonfire.ProjectOOP.Controller.AppController
@RestController
public class AppController
extends java.lang.Object
Class that manages all the requests the user can makes to the server.
Author:
Arianna Nazzarelli, Francesco Voto, Sara Santini

    • getSomeFilters2

      @RequestMapping(value="getFilters", method=GET) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Object> getSomeFilters2​(@RequestBody java.lang.String json) throws org.json.simple.parser.ParseException, java.lang.NumberFormatException, FilterNotFoundException
      Method that reply to the request GET/getFilters.
      Parameters:
      json - String of json
      Returns:
      the filter that the user request with jolly character.
      Throws:
      org.json.simple.parser.ParseException - which is thrown if there is any problem in the process of parsing.
      FilterNotFoundException - It is thrown when the filter doesn't exists.
      java.lang.NumberFormatException - It is thrown when the format of number isn't correct.

    • SearchPhoto

      @RequestMapping(value="searchPhoto", method=GET) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Object> SearchPhoto​(@RequestParam(name="id") java.lang.String id) throws FilterNotFoundException
      Method that reply to the request GET/searchPhoto.
      Parameters:
      id - Identify the photo to search.
      Returns:
      the photo requested by the user.
      Throws:
      FilterNotFoundException - It is thrown when the filter doesn't exists.
